title: My Pixel 3a won't respond to almost everything
content:
Last evening my phone was working normaly and I was charging it throughout the night. In the morning my phone wouldn't react to anything. 
I have tried holding the power button for 30sec or pressing the power button and the volume down button at the same time. Both Actions didn't do anything. 
The only response I get is when I connect the phone to a PC. The phone then shows up in the Device Manager.
